text: 11:15 1 Atriviba 12:31Atrivim Jeroboam me batuegha gɨvagha, a uabɨ mɨghsɨabar orazibar pɨn asebar ziaba fasa gumazir kɨnir maba amɨsevezɨ, me ofa gamir gumazibar otifi. Ofa gamir gumazir igiar kaba uaghan Jeroboam ingarizir bulmakaun apuribar nedaziba ko asebar marvir guabar ziaba fe.11:15 Gumazir maba ghaze, aser kaba, memebar mɨn gari.
